doc:
Pilar López de Ayala https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pilar_L%C3%B3pez_de_Ayala 0 Pilar López de Ayala Arroyo (born 18 September 1978 in Madrid) is a Spanish film actress. She received a Goya for her role as Queen Joanna of Castile in the 2001 film Juana la Loca, directed by Vicente Aranda (released in the United States as Mad Love). Pilar_López de Ayala_Arroyo ( born 18_September_1978 in Madrid ) is a_Spanish_film_actress . She received a_Goya for her_role as Queen_Joanna of Castile in the_2001_film_Juana_la_Loca , directed by Vicente_Aranda (_released in the_United_States as Mad_Love_) .
